enhanced_description: Fluentgrid Limited, established in 1998, specializes in the digital transformation of energy utilities and smart cities globally. They provide robust software products and proven turnkey solutions, including Commercial Off-The-Shelf (COTS) products like CIS, MDMS, and the Actilligence® platform. These solutions are designed to address the commercial, operational, analytical, and administrative needs for energy & water utilities, cities & communities. Fluentgrid's offerings, which include features like Asset and Maintenance Management, Charging Station Management, and Meter Data Management, have been recognized in analyst reports by Gartner and Guidehouse Insights. The company operates under mature process frameworks compliant with CMMI L5, ISO 9001, ISO 20000, ISO 27001, ISO 14001, and ISO 45001, ensuring timely and sustainable solution delivery. With over two decades of industry expertise, Fluentgrid aims to facilitate seamless business transformation for its customers, leading to lower Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) and faster Return on Investment (RoI). While primarily focused on utilities and smart cities, Fluentgrid's solutions also support broader business objectives such as improving employee happiness and engagement, and accelerating skill development and learning efficiency, aligning with aspects of employee development and learning efficiency.
